items.composition: Body: 72% Cotton, 28% Polyester/ Rib: 73% Polyester, 27% Cotton
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- Smooth pique fabric made from a blend of lustrous look of cotton and quick-drying polyester.
- Cool and comfortable polo shirts perfect for sports and everyday wear.
- Meticulous collar design keeps its shape after repeated washing and wearing.
- More breathable than other fabrics such as jersey with DRY technology to enhance comfort and smooth texture to the skin.
- We are constantly fine-tuning the details of this classic design, including the collar which is designed to look good whether buttoned up or unbuttoned.
- Updated collar stitching for improved comfort.
- Ribbed cuffs for a traditional look.
- Versatile basic design and cut for easy styling.
- Later embraced by fashion-conscious youths, polo shorts have become a beloved icon of preppy style.
- Two stripes on the collar add a sporty look.
items.name: Dry Pique Short Sleeve Polo (Tipping)
items.shortDescription: Versatile design and cut for any outfit. Double stripe on the collar adds a style accent.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.composition: Body: 80% Polyester, 20% Nylon ( 40% Uses Recycled Polyester Fiber )/ Rib: 100% Polyester ( 50% Uses Recycled Polyester Fiber )
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- With quick-drying 'DRY-EX' technology.
- Odor control and Cool Touch features.
- The fabric structure quickly absorbs and wicks away sweat to keep you feeling fresh.
- Versatile low-contrast tonal heathered color great for everyday and office wear.
- Ergonomic mesh design.
- Designed with 3 different types of mesh, including breathable mesh at the underarms and mid-back.
- The mesh sections are mapped (knitted into the fabric) rather than sewn together to ensure a smooth, light feel.
- Made from recycled polyester.

items.shortDescription: Quick-drying 'DRY-EX' with mesh panels. Natural color great for sports or casual wear. Made from recycled polyester.
